articles.description: A dugout rebuild in Douglas County is doubling as hands-on trade training for local youth. Through the Made for Trades program, students are gaining construction experience, earning scholarships and preparing for careers in skilled trades while helping improve a community ballfield.

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Sutherlin police are investigating a Feb. 15 robbery at the Offyce Bar after two masked men posing as officers reportedly took cash and fled south on I-5 in a vehicle. No weapons were shown and no one was hurt. Police ask anyone with information to contact SPD.
articles.title: Police Investigating Robbery at Sutherlin Bar; Suspects Impersonated Officers

articles.description: A Winter Weather Advisory and Winter Storm Warning are in effect for central Douglas County from late Monday through Thursday. Valley areas including Roseburg could see light snow, while higher elevations may get heavy accumulations. Travel impacts are likely, especially Tuesday.
articles.title: Winter Weather Advisory, Storm Warning issued for Douglas County as snow levels drop this week
